lines.text: Well... we know they couldn't have used any level 2 spells, thanks to this book...
Y-you don't know that, yet! You- you still need to prove it!
Yeah yeah yeah, I'll get to that.
Anyway, as long as we're assuming that...
...that statue's gotta be here for some other reason. That stone spell isn't on the table.
Yeah? And d'you have that reason figured out?
Uh... just, um, keep bearing with me?
You'll get it eventually, is that it?
